description: Detects the export of a crital Registry key to a file.
author: Oddvar Moe
Sander Wiebing
oscd.community
false_positives: Dumping hives for legitimate purpouse i.e. backup or forensic investigation
name: Exports Critical Registry Keys To a File
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\regedit.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGEDIT.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/E\ * OR *\ \-E\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*hklm* OR *hkey_local_machine*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\\system OR *\\sam OR *\\security))
